thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text:
For me this is freedom of speech on the net.
Many people and companies wants to play around and so to speak eat the cake and keep it.
TrustPilot gives us a chance to raise an averseness and also give the company in question a chance to improve on there faults.
So my obvious choice when i am out to buy stuff from a new company is to browse this site and read up on if this or that company is a company i want to do business with.
GOOD WORK TEAM -> TRUSTPiLOT
